headline.main: ALLIED AIR ATTACK AT RECORD WEIGHT; RAF and U.S. Planes Based in Britain Loosed 26,000 Tons of Bombs in July

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 1, -- The outer walls of Adolf Hitler's Fortress Europe may remain stout and strong, but the roof had gaping holes knocked in it during July that may eventually prove fatal to the Axis.
abstract: illus of Ital pub hailing new regime after Mussolini fall
